title: On Your Own?
description: A Holiday Romance Short StoryFor the first time Meggie Joyce goes on holiday on her own. In Malta, she meets the mysterious Edward Rowley. He has the same name as the hero from her favourite TV series - and is just as handsome. Could this be a coincidence which leads to romance? Meggie hopes so.
